name: Looming (Jayden Lambert-Smith)
description:
As a newly hired journalist for the company Factivist, you have been tasked to investigate a village in the mountains. Many employees from other major rival companies have mysteriously gone missing while trying to gather information and vital recordings for evidence. After being woken up in the middle of the night from a loud nearby disturbance, you discover that the power is out.

You discover that there has been a village-wide epidemic infection which causes a fatal mutation. All residents have now turned into mutants and are very hostile. With your life at stake, will you manage to survive?
